catalog.title: Wisdom Journeys
catalog.subtitle: Transform Your Inner Challenges
catalog.description: Multi-day guided paths to overcome the six inner enemies with Bhagavad Gita wisdom

transform-anger-demo.title: Transform Anger (Krodha)
transform-anger-demo.description: A 14-day journey to transform destructive anger into constructive energy through Gita wisdom. Learn to recognize triggers, practice patience, and cultivate inner peace.

master-desire-demo.title: Mastering Desire (Kama)
master-desire-demo.description: A 21-day journey to understand and master desires. Transform cravings into purposeful aspirations aligned with your dharma.

overcome-greed-demo.title: Contentment Over Greed (Lobha)
overcome-greed-demo.description: A 14-day journey to cultivate santosha (contentment) and release the grip of greed. Find abundance in simplicity.

clarity-attachment-demo.title: Clarity Over Attachment (Moha)
clarity-attachment-demo.description: A 21-day journey to see through delusion and attachment. Develop viveka (discrimination) and find clarity.

humility-pride-demo.title: Humility Over Ego (Mada)
humility-pride-demo.description: A 14-day journey to dissolve ego and cultivate true humility. Recognize the Self beyond the small self.

joy-envy-demo.title: Joy Over Envy (Matsarya)
joy-envy-demo.description: A 14-day journey to transform jealousy into appreciative joy (mudita). Celebrate others' success as your own.

six-enemies-demo.title: Conquer All Six Enemies
six-enemies-demo.description: A comprehensive 30-day journey addressing all six inner enemies. The ultimate path to self-mastery and liberation.
